body: I am looking at [CopyGPUTensorToCPU](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.2/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_util.cc#L304-L347). It eventually calls [ThenMemcpy](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.2/tensorflow/stream_executor/stream.h#L1492-L1497). The comment says the host memory needs to be registered. I am not familiar with this piece of code, but this is not done in the verbs code. If it is indeed required, then it is what's missing.
